revised_title: Anatomical Study of the Intracranial Vascular System in Sphenodon
tldr: This study provides a detailed description and analysis of the intracranial blood vessels in Sphenodon, a reptile, using a unique method of investigation. The research reveals similarities and differences in the vascular system compared to other reptiles, such as Lacertilia and Chelonia, and highlights the importance of the transverse sinuses and their connection to the extracranial vascular system.
